reviewText: great information for Malcolm x fans...after all these years I learned even more about his murder and the dirty jealous plot to eliminate what I consider one of the greatest freedom fighters in the last 100 years for our human rights...this is a must have...and I do mean a must have....peace

Good video, I could have done without all the sponsoring organization's pageantry and went right to Kondo's presentation.  I would still highly recommend, but also be sure to try to find his out of print book. After reading this I could skip some of Manning Marable's massive new book, as Konda pretty much nails the plot to kill Malcolm.
